item.title: 调查发现，第一季度房地产市场情绪降幅为大流行病以来最大
item.description: 一项最新调查显示，受美国总统唐纳德-特朗普新关税政策的影响，美国商业地产融资市场的乐观情绪在第一季度出现了有史以来第二大跌幅。【原文：Optimism in the U.S. market for commercial real estate financing witnessed its second largest drop ever in the first quarter, triggered by President Donald Trump's new tariff policies, a new survey found.】

item.title: 美国机构将放宽自动驾驶汽车部署障碍，保留报告规则
item.description: 特朗普政府周四表示，它的目标是加快自动驾驶汽车的部署，但将维持要求报告涉及先进车辆的安全事故的规定。【原文：The Trump administration said Thursday it aims to speed up the deployment of self-driving vehicles but will maintain rules requiring reporting of safety incidents involving advanced vehicles.】

item.title: 宝洁依靠价值 380 美元的电动牙刷和升级版剃须刀抵消关税
item.description: 宝洁公司（Procter & Gamble）打赌，消费者会掏钱购买价格较高的 380 美元电动牙刷、改良版帮宝适尿布和袖珍型总是护垫，以抵消特朗普政府反复无常的关税政策带来的新成本。【原文：Procter & Gamble is betting consumers will shell out for $380 electric toothbrushes, spruced-up Pampers diapers and pocket-sized Always pads, which command higher prices, to offset new costs from the Trump administration's erratic tariff policy.】

item.title: 中国保险经纪元宝网在贸易紧张局势下赴美上市，目标估值6.76亿美元
item.description: 中国保险经纪公司元宝周四表示，在美国宣布征收新关税导致经济不确定性和IPO上市放缓的情况下，该公司在美国首次公开募股的目标估值最高可达6.763亿美元。【原文：Chinese insurance broker Yuanbao said on Thursday that it was targeting a valuation of up to $676.3 million in its U.S. initial public offering, amid economic uncertainty and a slowdown in IPO listings following the announcement of new U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: BPM 银行正式拒绝联合信贷银行的收购要约
item.description: 意大利第三大银行 Banco BPM 周四正式拒绝了更大竞争对手意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）的收购要约，称收购价格过低，其股东将在合并后的实体中受到惩罚。【原文：Italy's third-largest bank Banco BPM on Thursday formally rejected a takeover bid by bigger rival UniCredit , saying the price was too low and that its shareholders would be penalised in the combined entity.】

item.title: 消息人士称特朗普将于周四签署深海采矿行政令
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）预计将于周四签署一项行政命令，以促进深海采矿业的发展，这是他开发国际镍、铜和其他广泛应用于经济领域的重要矿产资源的最新尝试。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump is expected to sign an executive order on Thursday to boost the deep-sea mining industry, the latest attempt to tap international deposits of nickel, copper and other critical minerals used widely across the economy.】

item.title: 米其林第一季度销售额降幅低于预期
item.description: 法国轮胎制造商米其林公布的第一季度销售额降幅略低于预期，原因是原装设备销量的减少被替换零件销量的增加部分抵消。【原文：French tyre maker Michelin reported a slightly smaller than expected drop in first-quarter sales as lower original equipment volumes were partly offset by higher replacement parts.】

item.title: 卡尼说：加拿大决定汽车行业的未来，而不是特朗普
item.description: 路透社不列颠哥伦比亚省莫迪港4月24日电）加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）周四驳斥了唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）关于不想要加拿大汽车的言论，重申美国总统想要破坏加拿大。【原文：PORT MOODY, British Columbia, April 24 (Reuters) - Prime Minister Mark Carney on Thursday dismissed Donald Trump's remarks about not wanting Canadian cars, reiterating that the U.S. President wanted to break Canada.】

item.title: 衍生品交易所 CME 将推出 XRP 期货，推动加密货币发展
item.description: CME集团周四表示，该衍生品交易所将在下个月推出与XRP加密货币挂钩的期货合约，旨在利用人们对比特币和以太币以外的代币日益增长的兴趣。【原文：CME Group will launch futures contracts tied to the XRP cryptocurrency next month, the derivatives exchange said on Thursday, aiming to tap into the growing interest in tokens other than bitcoin and ether.】

item.title: 据天空新闻报道，英国 NewDay 集团引起竞购者的收购兴趣
item.description: 据天空新闻（Sky News）周四报道，英国金融服务公司 NewDay 集团的部分或全部业务引起了收购兴趣，其中包括贝恩资本（Bain Capital）牵头的财团的出价。【原文：British financial services firm NewDay Group has attracted takeover interest for parts or all of its business, including a bid from a Bain Capital-led consortium, Sky News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 家乐福坚持 2025 年目标，第一季度法国销售额有所增长
item.description: 欧洲最大的食品零售商家乐福第一季度销售额同比增长 2.9%，得益于其仅次于法国的第二大市场巴西的稳健表现，该公司保持了 2025 年利润和现金略有增长的目标不变。【原文：Carrefour , Europe's largest food retailer, kept its 2025 targets for slightly higher profits and cash intact after sales rose 2.9% like-for-like in the first quarter, thanks to a solid performance in Brazil, its second-largest market after France.】

item.title: 美联储官员主张在衡量关税影响时保持耐心
item.description: 美联储官员周四在接受电视采访时表示，他们认为在寻求更多信息以确定特朗普政府的贸易关税如何影响经济的同时，并不急于改变货币政策。【原文：Federal Reserve officials speaking in television interviews on Thursday indicated they see no urgency for a change in monetary policy as they seek more information to determine how the Trump administration’s trade tariffs are affecting the economy.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）：中国仍有空间加大刺激力度，解决房地产问题
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）亚太部主任克里希纳-斯里尼瓦桑（Krishna Srinivasan）周四表示，中国需要采取更多措施来解决房地产行业的问题，并有余地提供更多刺激措施来刺激消费。【原文：China needs to do more to address its property-sector problems and has scope to provide more stimulus to boost consumption, Krishna Srinivasan, director of the International Monetary Fund's Asia and Pacific Department, said on Thursday.】

item.title: 南非央行行长：新兴经济体面临更长的融资紧缩期
item.description: 南非央行行长告诉路透社记者，新兴经济体将不得不在更长的时间内努力应对全球融资条件的收紧，而无风险资产的未来则是人们关注的焦点。【原文：Emerging economies will have to grapple with tighter global financing conditions for longer while the future of risk-free assets is very much in focus, the head of South Africa's central bank told Reuters.】

item.title: 格奥尔基耶娃：国际货币基金组织将继续关注稳定，支持各国应对气候变化
item.description: 国际货币基金组织总裁克里斯塔琳娜-格奥尔基耶娃（Kristalina Georgieva）周四表示，国际货币基金组织将继续 "专注于 "防止国际收支危机，并将特朗普政府的担忧纳入其政策，但将继续支持受气候变化影响的国家。【原文：The International Monetary Fund will stay "laser focused" on preventing balance of payments crises and incorporate the Trump administration's concerns into its policies but will keep supporting countries affected by climate change, Managing Director Kristalina Georgieva said on Thursday.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易战给企业带来更多阴霾
item.description: 随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的贸易战推高成本、延长供应链并引发对全球经济的担忧，各行各业的企业都在提高价格、削减财务指标，并警告不确定性正在增加。【原文：Businesses across multiple industries are increasing prices, cutting financial guidance and warning of growing uncertainty as U.S. President Donald Trump's trade war pushes up costs, up-ends supply chains and stirs concerns about the global economy.】

item.title: 波音公司首席执行官 "毫不吝啬 "在必要时引进新高管
item.description: 波音公司首席执行官凯利-奥特伯格（Kelly Ortberg）周四赞扬了公司高层管理人员的表现，但他在年度股东大会上表示，如果需要，他将毫不犹豫地增加人员。【原文：Boeing CEO Kelly Ortberg on Thursday praised the performance of upper management at the company, but told its annual general meeting that he would not hesitate to add personnel if needed.】

item.title: 消息人士称，摩根士丹利 Infra Partners 希望以 20 亿美元出售二叠纪输油管道
item.description: 三位知情人士透露，摩根士丹利基础设施合伙公司（Morgan Stanley Infrastructure Partners）正在探索出售其在布拉佐斯中游二期公司（Brazos Midstream II）的多数股权，预计交易价值（包括债务）将超过 20 亿美元。【原文：Morgan Stanley Infrastructure Partners is exploring the sale of its majority stake in Brazos Midstream II, with a deal expected to value its holding at more than $2 billion including debt, three people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 欧特克与 Starboard 和解，两名董事加入董事会
item.description: 在激进对冲基金 Starboard Value 上个月向这家软件设计公司发起董事会挑战后，欧特克公司周四表示，将为董事会增加两名新人，并解决今年最引人注目的代理权争夺战之一。【原文：Autodesk said on Thursday it will add two newcomers to its board and settle one of the year's most high-profile proxy fights after activist hedge fund Starboard Value mounted a boardroom challenge at the software-design company last month.】

item.title: 担忧关税，2024 年美国烈酒出口增长 10
item.description: 根据美国蒸馏酒理事会（DISCUS）的报告，受最大出口市场欧盟供应量激增的推动，2024 年美国烈酒出口额将增长 10%，达到 24 亿美元。【原文：U.S. spirits exports rose 10% in 2024 to $2.4 billion, according to a report by Distilled Spirits Council of the United States (DISCUS), driven by a surge in supply to the European Union, the biggest export market.】

item.title: 美国联合航空公司投资飞机初创公司 JetZero
item.description: 美国联合航空公司（United Airlines）周四表示，该公司已对 JetZero 进行了投资。【原文：United Airlines said on Thursday it has made an investment in JetZero, a startup looking to build a blended wing body aircraft aimed at reducing fuel burn in the skies.】

item.title: 由于股票奖励激增，美国首席执行官薪酬中位数达到创纪录的 1,680 万美元
item.description: 一项新的研究发现，2024 年美国顶级首席执行官的薪酬中位数增长了 7.5%，达到创纪录的 1,680 万美元，因为大笔股票赠款使领导者的报告收入远远超过了美国工人的薪酬。【原文：Median pay among top U.S. CEOs rose 7.5% to a record $16.8 million for 2024, a new study found, as big stock grants boosted leaders' reported earnings well beyond the pay received by U.S. workers.】

item.title: 美国 3 月成屋销售降幅超预期
item.description: 受借贷成本上升的拖累，美国 3 月份成屋销售降幅超出预期，而且随着人们对关税导致经济放缓的担忧日益加剧，需求可能进一步疲软。【原文：U.S. existing home sales fell more than expected in March, weighed down by higher borrowing costs, and further weakness is likely as growing concerns of an economic slowdown because of tariffs sap demand.】

item.title: 加密货币公司 Tether 将所持尤文图斯股份增至 10%以上
item.description: 加密货币公司 Tether 周四表示，已将其在意甲尤文图斯足球俱乐部的持股比例进一步提高到 10%以上。【原文：Cryptocurrency firm Tether said on Thursday it had further raised its stake in Italian Serie A soccer club Juventus to over 10%.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，摩根士丹利将出售最后 12 亿美元的 X 债务
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四援引一位熟知内情的人士的话报道，摩根士丹利已开始出售与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）以 440 亿美元收购社交媒体平台 Twitter（现名 X）相关的最后一笔价值 12.3 亿美元的债务。【原文：Morgan Stanley has launched a sale of the last $1.23 billion worth of debt tied to Elon Musk's $44 billion buyout of social media platform Twitter, now called X, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday, citing a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 智利监管机构为 Codelco-SQM 锂合资企业开绿灯
item.description: 智利竞争监管机构批准了国营铜业巨头 Codelco 公司与 SQM 公司组建合资企业扩大阿塔卡马盐滩锂生产的交易，Codelco 公司在周四的一份声明中说。【原文：Chile's competition regulator approved a deal between Codelco, the state-run copper giant, and SQM to form a joint venture to expand lithium production in the Atacama salt flats, Codelco said in a statement on Thursday.】

item.title: 美联储主席哈马克称美联储在政策上应保持耐心 - CNBC
item.description: 克利夫兰联邦储备银行行长贝丝-哈马克（Beth Hammack）周四呼吁在高度不确定性的情况下对货币政策保持耐心，如果数据表明需要采取行动，不排除在 6 月份之前改变货币政策的可能性。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Cleveland President Beth Hammack on Thursday called for patience on monetary policy amid high levels of uncertainty, and did not rule out monetary policy changes by June if the data suggested action was needed.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）称亚洲各国央行有空间放宽利率以减轻美国关税打击
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund, 简称 "基金组织"）一位高级官员周四表示，许多亚洲国家的中央银行都有放松货币政策的空间，以减轻美国关税对其经济的打击，此前基金组织下调了对出口驱动型地区的国内生产总值（GDP）预估。【原文：Many Asian central banks have room to ease monetary policy to cushion the blow to their economies from U.S. tariffs, a senior International Monetary Fund official said on Thursday, after the fund cut its GDP estimates for the export-driven region.】

item.title: 加密货币运动人士呼吁瑞士央行持有比特币
item.description: 加密货币运动人士加紧呼吁瑞士国家银行购买比特币，称美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税引发的全球经济动荡使央行更有必要使其储备多样化。【原文：Cryptocurrency campaigners have stepped up calls for the Swiss National Bank to buy bitcoin, saying the global economic turmoil triggered by U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs made it more important for the central bank to diversify its reserves.】

item.title: 投资者押注市场复苏，杠杆式股票 ETF 大受欢迎
item.description: 本月，杠杆股票交易基金的资金流入激增，因为一些投资者试图在市场从美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易关税引发的大跌中复苏时，为放大收益做好准备。【原文：Leveraged equity exchange-traded funds have seen a surge in inflows this month as some investors seek to position for amplified gains when markets recover from a selloff induced by U.S. President Donald Trump's trade tariffs.】
